      "text": "Trouble-shooting table"
    },
    {
      "type": "TableItem",
      "table_data": {
        "Problem": {
          "0": "Incorrect appli- cation rates  (kg per hec- tare)",
          "1": "Incorrect appli- cation rates  (kg per hec- tare)",
          "2": "Incorrect appli- cation rates  (kg per hec- tare)",
          "3": "Incorrect appli- cation rates  (kg per hec- tare)",
          "4": "Incorrect appli- cation rates  (kg per hec- tare)",

          "6": "Incorrect appli- cation rates  (kg per hec- tare)",
          "7": "Incorrect appli- cation rates  (kg per hec- tare)",
          "8": "Incorrect appli- cation rates  (kg per hec- tare)",
          "9": "Incorrect appli- cation rates  (kg per hec- tare)",
          "10": "Incorrect appli- cation rates  (kg per hec- tare)",
          "11": "Incorrect appli- cation rates  (kg per hec- tare)",
          "12": "Incorrect appli- cation rates  (kg per hec- tare)",
          "13": "Difference be- tween the flow- rate on the left  and the right  spreading  discs",
          "14": "Difference be- tween the flow- rate on the left  and the right  spreading  discs",
          "15": "Difference be- tween the flow- rate on the left  and the right  spreading  discs"
        },
        "Possible cause": {
          "0": "Dosing setting incorrectly set",
          "1": "Incorrect setting for fine dosage",
          "2": "Driving speed signal not correctly set",
          "3": "Incorrect driving speed signal",
          "4": "Incorrect distance between the driving  tracks",
          "5": "New type of fertiliser spread with the  same settings as the previous type. Qual- ity varies greatly between types.",
          "6": "The flow of the fertiliser is blocked",
          "7": "Dosing setting and flowrate not entered  on the 'Curve Calibration' screen before  starting work activities",
          "8": "Incorrect application rate, working width  and/or letter value discharge point en- tered",
          "9": "The control system is being operated  manually, so it does not perform automat- ic calibration",
          "10": "Incorrect values entered after a manual  calibration test at a manually entered ap- plication rate",
          "11": "The speedometer is incorrect or not  measuring",
          "12": "For a tractor without driving speed meas- urement: the simulated and real driving  speeds do not correspond",
          "13": "Actuators set unequally",
          "14": "The stop of one or both of the actuators  have been moved",
          "15": "Discharge is blocked on the one side"
        },
        "Solution": {
          "0": "Check the dosing setting",
          "1": "Set the dosing setting for fine application  as per the instructions",
          "2": "Set the correct source of the driving speed  signal in the control system, as well as the  control box",
          "3": "Calibrate the driving speed",
          "4": "Always set the driving tracks before  spreading",
          "5": "Determine the characteristics of the fertil- iser, look for the relevant spreading chart  and set the spreader again",
          "6": "Clean the machine well after each use. Replace the agitator if it is worn out",
          "7": "Find the correct values in the spreading  chart and enter them",
          "8": "Enter the correct values in the control sys- tem",
          "9": "Switch to automatic operation",
          "10": "Perform the calibration test in the correct  manner and enter the result obtained",
          "11": "Check the sensors and cables and cali- brate the wheel sensor or radar",
          "12": "Adjust the simulated driving speed on the  main screen or the real driving speed",
          "13": "Check the settings",
          "14": "Check the position of the connecting  points and readjust them",
          "15": "Clean the machine well after each use. Replace the agitator if it is worn out"
        },
        "Pag e": {

  "items": [
    {

    },
    {
      "type": "TableItem",
      "table_data": {
        "Problem": {
          "0": "Great amounts  of dust while  spreading",
          "1": "Great amounts  of dust while  spreading",
          "2": "Great amounts  of dust while  spreading",
          "3": "Great amounts  of dust while  spreading",
          "4": "Spreading  tracks visible  among the  crops",
          "5": "Spreading  tracks visible  among the  crops",
          "6": "Spreading  tracks visible  among the  crops",
          "7": "Spreading  tracks visible  among the  crops",
          "8": "Spreading  tracks visible  among the  crops",
          "9": "Spreading  tracks visible  among the  crops",
          "10": "Spreading  tracks visible  among the  crops",
          "11": "Spreading  tracks visible  among the  crops",
          "12": "Spreading  tracks visible  among the  crops",
          "13": "Spreading  tracks visible  among the  crops",
          "14": "Spreading  tracks visible  among the  crops",
          "15": "Spreading  tracks visible  among the  crops",
          "16": "Spreading  tracks visible  among the  crops"
        },
        "Possible cause": {
          "0": "Average quality fertiliser (too soft, broken,  mixed types) or incorrect storage",
          "1": "Rpm on the spreading discs too high",
          "2": "agitator grinds. Dosing units closed for too  long with the PTO shaft running",
          "3": "Right agitator grinds",
          "4": "Average quality fertiliser. 80% of the gran- ules with a diameter between 2.0 - 4.75  mm",
          "5": "Blend of fertiliser types used. A blend can  become unmixed again or types of fertil- iser could contain varying spreading qual- ities",
          "6": "New type of fertiliser spread with the  same settings as the previous type. Qual- ity varies greatly between types.",
          "7": "Use of wrong spreading chart",
          "8": "Working with unfavourable weather con- ditions: high levels of humidity, rain, heat  or high wind speeds (> 5 m/sec)",
          "9": "Incorrect overlapping of the spreading  pattern",
          "10": "Horizontal/vertical settings of the machine  not correct",
          "11": "Spreader not set to the correct height",
          "12": "Working width incorrect",
          "13": "Worn or missing vanes",
          "14": "Tyre pressure on the left and right not the  same",
          "15": "The setting mechanism of the discharge  point is not set well",
          "16": "The dosing mechanism is not set well"
        },
        "Solution": {
          "0": "Contact your supplier. Update the storage area. Spread with smaller working widths as far  as possible",
          "1": "Check the PTO shaft speed and the cou- pling shaft mounting point",
          "2": "Switch the PTO shaft off after closing the  dosing units. Check the agitator for damage",
          "3": "Spreading disc not disconnected while  border spreading with the border spread- ing plate",
          "4": "Determine the distribution and spread  with small working widths if possible",
          "5": "Check the type, pattern and distribution. Spread with smaller working widths as far  as possible",
          "6": "Determine the characteristics of the fertil- iser, look for the relevant spreading chart  and set the spreader again",
          "7": "Determine the characteristics of the fertil- iser and select the correct spreading chart",
          "8": "Only work under good weather conditions",
          "9": "Always set the driving tracks before  spreading",
          "10": "Check if the machine is standing level  horizontally and vertically.",
          "11": "Check and set to the correct working  height (75 cm above the crops or soil)",
          "12": "Check the discharge point letter and the  PTO shaft RPM",
          "13": "Check the vanes",
          "14": "Check the tyre pressure",
          "15": "Perform the \u00bbChecking and setting the  discharge point setting mechanism\u00ab",
          "16": "Perform the \u00bbChecking and setting the  dosing mechanism\u00ab"
        },
        "Pag e": {

          "1": "46,",

{

    {
      "type": "TableItem",
      "table_data": {
        "Problem": {
          "0": "Machine  makes a noise  while running",
          "1": "Machine  makes a noise  while running",
          "2": "Machine  makes a noise  while running",
          "3": "Machine  makes a noise  while running",
          "4": "Powerful vibra- tions percepti- ble",
          "5": "Powerful vibra- tions percepti- ble",
          "6": "Powerful vibra- tions percepti- ble",
          "7": "Powerful vibra- tions percepti- ble",
          "8": "Alarm on the  control box  screen",
          "9": "The external  system is not  communicat- ing with the  control box",
          "10": "The external  system is not  communicat- ing with the  control box",
          "11": "The external  system is not  communicat- ing with the  control box",
          "12": "The external  system is not  communicat- ing with the  control box",
          "13": "Spreader does  not appear on  the screen",
          "14": "Spreader does  not appear on  the screen",
          "15": "Spreader does  not appear on  the screen"
        },
        "Possible cause": {
          "0": "Discharge bushing makes contact with  the spreading disc",
          "1": "Spreader put down with filled hopper",
          "2": "Spreading disc hidden/ out of balance",
          "3": "Build-up of fertiliser at the agitator and/or  spreading discs",
          "4": "Shut down the PTO shaft immediately!",
          "5": "Great imbalance in the spreading discs",
          "6": "Bent agitator axle or damaged agitator",
          "7": "PTO shaft working angle out of working  reach",
          "8": "The control system cannot perform re- quested function correctly",
          "9": "RS232 plug does not have the correct  connection on the side of the control box  for the signal from the external system",
          "10": "The control box and external systems are  not communicating with each other in the  same language",
          "11": "Application rate control by means of an  external signal is not connected",
          "12": "External system not switched on or incor- rectly set",
          "13": "Control box displays another system",
          "14": "Spreader ISO plug not connected",
          "15": "Power supply to the spreader and/or con- trol box interrupted"
        },
        "Solution": {
          "0": "Please contact your dealer",
          "1": "Repair the machine.  Set dosing mechanism and discharge  point again",
          "2": "Check the spreading discs for damage  and for the presence of all the vanes",
          "3": "Remove the fertiliser. Clean the machine well after each use.",
          "4": "Attend to the problem to prevent damage",
          "5": "Check the vanes and spreading discs",
          "6": "Replace the agitator axle or the agitator",
          "7": "Limit the working angle to a maximum of  30\u00ba",
          "8": "Consult meaning and advice in the soft- ware instruction manual.",
          "9": "Check and modify the plug pin occupation  on the side of the control box, see user's  manual for control box and external sys- tem",
          "10": "Check the control box settings by means  of the external system data, see user's  manual for the control box, tractor, Tellus  and external system",
          "11": "Switch on the external signal reception See the software instruction manual.",
          "12": "Check external system operation",
          "13": "Press the switch key to choose the  spreader display",
          "14": "Connect the spreader ISO plug",
          "15": "Check the electrical cables and fuses"
        },
